weekly_top_story.headline: House Appropriations Committee Advances HHS Funding Bill with Key Public Health Provisions
weekly_top_story.summary: The House Appropriations Committee passed the Labor, Health and Human Services, Education funding bill retaining funding for mRNA projects and prohibiting funding for the WISeR Model, setting the stage for critical health policy funding debates.

stories.headline: New 340B ACCESS Act Introduced in House to Reform Drug Pricing Program
stories.summary: The 340B ACCESS Act proposes transparency and stricter eligibility for the 340B drug pricing program to address taxpayer costs and improve patient affordability, signaling potential changes in hospital and pharmacy drug pricing practices.
